EmailTemplate.name: 4/30/2014 Everbank Webcast.DELETE
EmailTemplate.subject: LEGO X-Wing vs. Millennium Falcon | Register & Vote to Win
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<http://www.vmturbo.com?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=header> A VMTurbo Webinar Invitation Best Practices for Virtualization Management: How Everbank Leverages VMTurbo to Reduce CapEx and OpEx While Driving Innovation WHAT: Webinar, followed by a LEGO Star WarsTM Raffle WHEN: Wednesday, April 30, 2014, 9 am PDT / Noon EDT / 5 pm GMT FEATURING: Roger Bowen, Manager IT Data Center Operations, Everbank Steve Corndell, Solutions Director, VMTurbo
Everbank is one of the fastest-growing regional banks in the United States. From award-winning banking products to unique, sophisticated investing opportunities backed by precious metals, Everbank is a distinguished innovator in retail banking. Join us on this webinar where you'll learn firsthand:
- How you, like Everbank, can leverage technology to power your innovation-driven strategy - The specific, increasingly complex technology challenges caused by Everbank's rapid business growth - The virtualization performance issues that threatened Everbank's ability to innovate - How Everbank overcame these challenges while reducing capital and operational expenses with VMTurbo - And much more
All webinar registrants will be entered to win a LEGOTM Star WarsTM X-Wing or LEGOTM Star WarsTM Millennium Falcon - you vote and decide! Register Now <http://bit.ly/QecPGi> Downloads White Papers Products 500 Boylston Street, Eighth Floor, Boston, MA 02116 Tel: 866.634.5087
